test.name: TC_UI_9

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.
kw.msg: Firefox driver log is always forced to to: C:\Users\Dawid\Desktop\s\Python\Software_Testing\Project\geckodriver-13.log

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.arg: css:#app > div > header > div > nav > form > div > input
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'ps5' into text field 'css:#app > div > header > div > nav > form > div > input'.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.arg: css:#app > div > header > div > nav > form > div > div > button.Button-sc-mt7im1-0.IconButton-sc-12838oi-0.sc-93rccr-2.QXKkW.glDAmc.dBrvnp

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Capture Element Screenshot

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Warn On Failure
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword logs a warning if the keyword fails.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
